title: Processes - Area between Curves - Functions of y

content.question: What is the area of the region in the first quadrant bounded on the left by the graph of <math alttext="x equals, y times, the square root of y to the fourth power, plus 1, end root " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>y</mi><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math> and on the right by the graph of <math alttext="x equals 2 y " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

topic.text: 8.5: Finding the Area Between Curves Expressed as Functions of y

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
